scripts.build: npm run -w @tribble/sdk-core build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-agent build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-chat build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-ingest build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-docs build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-workflows build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-events build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-actions build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-connectors build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-auth build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-queue build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-render build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk build && npm run -w @tribble/sdk-cli build
